Name: Perfect
About the game: 'Perfect' is a unique puzzle game, which takes brains to perfect all gems. There are 96 maps in the game,consists of six chapters: love, strength, integrity, gentleness, innocence and perfection.It includes different ways of playing, such as basic maps, reward maps, bomb maps, rainbow maps, etc.suitable for all ages. Every sliding block is cool and can cause a combo. In some specific maps, we need the help of rainbow to get through. 'Perfect' is very helpful to exercise logical thinking ability. We are not perfect, but we never give up pursuing; we may have been lost, and now we will return to perfection. We advocate minimalist design concepts, so that the game as much as possible without explanation and almost no text. Players as young as a few years old can start the game smoothly.
